data.title: Fuel Tech Inc expected to post earnings of 1 cent a share - Earnings Preview
data.description:
• Fuel Tech Inc is expected to show a rise in quarterly revenue when it reports results on November 4 for the period ending September 30 2025

  • The Warrenville Illinois-based company is expected to report a 19.6% increase in revenue to $9.387 million from $7.85 million a year ago, according to the estimate from one analyst, based on LSEG data.

  • ​LSEG's mean analyst estimate for Fuel Tech Inc is for earnings of 1 cent per share.

  • The one available analyst rating on the shares is "buy".

  • The mean earnings estimate of analysts was unchanged in the last three months. ​

  • Wall Street's median 12-month price target for Fuel Tech Inc is $4.00, about 36% above its last closing price of $2.56

data.title: Bank of America says responding to requests on fair banking access
data.description:
Bank of America said on Friday it is responding to requests including those arising from President Donald Trump's executive order on guaranteeing fair banking access to all Americans.

The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) in September said it was rolling out new guidance to discourage banks from cutting off, or "debanking," customers on political and religious grounds, a month after Trump directed oversight agencies to scrutinize banks for political bias.

data.title: Pfizer Files Lawsuit Against Metsera And Its Directors And Novo Nordisk For Breach Of Merger Agreement
data.description:
Pfizer Inc :

  • PFIZER FILES LAWSUIT AGAINST METSERA AND ITS DIRECTORS AND NOVO NORDISK FOR BREACH OF MERGER AGREEMENT

  • PFIZER - ALLEGES THAT NOVO NORDISK OFFER CANNOT QUALIFY AS A "SUPERIOR COMPANY PROPOSAL" UNDER TERMS OF MERGER AGREEMENT

  • PFIZER - FILED MOTION WITH COURT OF CHANCERY REQUESTING THAT IT ISSUE A TEMPORARY RESTRAINING ORDER TO BLOCK METSERA FROM TERMINATING MERGER AGREEMENT

  • PFIZER: ALLEGES PROPOSED SPECIAL DIVIDEND CONTEMPLATED BY NOVO NORDISK'S PROPOSAL IS VIOLATION OF DELAWARE LAW

  • PFIZER: METSERA'S & ITS DIRECTORS' ACTIONS AND THOSE OF NOVO NORDISK, ARE IN "CLEAR VIOLATION" OF RESPECTIVE CONTRACTUAL AND LEGAL OBLIGATIONS

data.title: Shareholders SueWallSt in New Class Action Against Fluor Corporation - Act Now
data.description:
NEW YORK, NY / ACCESS Newswire / October 31, 2025 / - SueWallSt: Class Action Filed Against Fluor Corporation - Contact Levi & Korsinsky

A Class Action lawsuit was filed on behalf of investors who lost money as a result of alleged securities fraud between February 18, 2025 and July 31, 2025.

If you suffered a loss in Fluor Corporation, don't stay silent. Take action now by visiting:

https://zlk.com/suewallst2?wire=1

If you have any questions about this class action lawsuit or any other sudden or unexpected stock loss, email lostmoney@suewallst.com or call Levi & Korsinsky at (888)-SUE-WALLST (783-9255).

Get more information on this and other class action lawsuits on the SueWallSt podcast and subscribe to the SueWallst WhatsApp channel for breaking class action news.

SueWallSt Channel

LEVI & KORSINSKY: Over the past 20 years, the team at Levi & Korsinsky has secured hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders and built a track record of winning high-stakes cases. Our firm has extensive expertise representing investors in complex securities litigation and a team of over 70 employees to serve our clients. For seven years in a row, Levi & Korsinsky has ranked in ISS Securities Class Action Services' Top 50 Report as one of the top securities litigation firms in the United States.

CONTACT:

Levi & Korsinsky, LLP

Joseph E. Levi, Esq.

Ed Korsinsky, Esq.

33 Whitehall Street, 27th Floor

New York, NY 10004

jlevi@levikorsinsky.com

https://zlk.com/

data.title: Vistra Corp. CEO James A. Burke Sells 9,641 Shares
data.description:
Reporter NameBurke James A
RelationshipPresident and CEO, 10% Owner
TypeSell
Amount$1,853,964
SEC FilingForm 4

James A. Burke, President and CEO of Vistra Corp., and a 10% owner, sold 9,641 shares of common stock on October 29, 2025, at a price of $192.3 per share, totaling $1,853,964. Following the transaction, Burke directly owns 298,967 shares and indirectly owns 735,773 shares through various entities. The sale was executed under a Rule 10b5-1 trading plan adopted on June 12, 2025.

SEC Filing: Vistra Corp. [ VST ] - Form 4 - Oct. 31, 2025

data.title: UiPath CEO Dines Daniel Sells 45,000 Shares
data.description:
Reporter NameDines Daniel
RelationshipCEO and Chairman, 10% Owner
TypeSell
Amount$707,269
SEC FilingForm 4

UiPath's CEO and Chairman, Dines Daniel, who is also a 10% owner and serves as a director, sold 45,000 shares of Class A Common Stock on October 31, 2025, for a total sale amount of $707,269. The shares were sold at a weighted average price of $15.7171, within a price range of $15.5700 to $15.8500. Following this transaction, Dines Daniel directly owns 29,423,585 shares of UiPath.

SEC Filing: UiPath, Inc. [ PATH ] - Form 4 - Oct. 31, 2025

data.title: Singapore-Based Regenique, Which Provides Bio-Regenerative and Aesthetics Treatments, Expects to Offer 2M Shrs for $4-$5 Each
INFINITE GROUP INC SEC 10-Q Report
data.description:
INFINITE GROUP INC, a company specializing in managed support services, cybersecurity projects, and software solutions, has released its Form 10-Q report for the third quarter of 2023. The report provides a comprehensive overview of the company's financial and operational performance, highlighting key metrics and future outlooks.

Financial Highlights

Total Revenue: $1.71 million, decreased by 0.3% compared to the same period in 2022 due to the termination of smaller projects.

Gross Profit: $0.70 million, increased by 7.9% from the same period in 2022, driven by a decrease in payroll and benefits of salaried employees.

Operating Loss: $(0.58) million, improved by $8,445 compared to the same period in 2022, primarily due to increased sales and reduced general and administrative expenses.

Net Loss: $(0.85) million, improved by 21.5% compared to the same period in 2022, attributed to less sales compensation and initial recording of default interest in 2022.

Net Loss Per Share - Basic: $(1.65), improved by $0.76 compared to the same period in 2022.

Business Highlights

Revenue Segments: The company's revenue is divided into three major services: Managed Support Services, Cybersecurity Projects, and Software. Managed Support Services accounted for approximately 66% of sales in the three months ended September 30, 2023, and 64% for the nine months ended September 30, 2023. Software sales showed a 9% increase in the three months ended September 30, 2023, compared to the same period in 2022.

New Product Launches: The company continues to develop and market its Nodeware® solution, a patented SaaS product that automates network asset identification and cybersecurity vulnerability management. Nodeware is a key focus for the company, with significant sales and marketing resources allocated to its promotion.

Future Outlook: The company plans to continue focusing on its Nodeware solution and expects significant growth in this segment. It aims to differentiate itself in the cybersecurity market by combining customized software and professional services. The company is also exploring strategic acquisitions to expand its cybersecurity offerings.

SEC Filing: INFINITE GROUP INC [ IMCI ] - 10-Q - Oct. 31, 2025

data.title: Auric Minerals Announces Adjournment of Annual General Meeting Due to Lack of Quorum
data.description:
Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - October 31, 2025) - Auric Minerals Corp. ("Auric" or the "Company") announces that its annual general meeting of shareholders (the "Meeting"), originally scheduled for Wednesday, October 15, 2025 at 11:00 am PT, was convened but adjourned due to the absence of a quorum and postal situation.

The Meeting has been adjourned until Friday, November 14, 2025 at 11:00 am PT, and will be held by Microsoft Teams (details below).

During the period of the adjournment, the Company will continue to solicit votes from its shareholders with respect to the proposals set forth in Auric's Management Information Circular dated September 10, 2025. All Shareholders who have not yet voted their common shares are encouraged to do so as soon as possible. Shareholders of record as of the close of business on September 10, 2025, the record date for the Meeting, are eligible to vote at the adjourned Meeting.

All proxies previously submitted by shareholders will continue to be valid at the adjourned Meeting. Accordingly, shareholders who have submitted a proxy will not be required to submit any additional material.

The Notice and Management Information Circular for the Meeting, the Form of Proxy, and a form to request financial statements made available to shareholders are filed under the Company's SEDAR+ profile at www.sedarplus.ca and is also available at https://integraltransfer.com/auric. For those shareholders who have yet to submit their proxy, kindly download the form of proxy, complete, date, sign and email back to support@excelsiorsolutions.biz to have your shares voted.

Please note the new Meeting ID and passcode below for the upcoming adjourned Meeting:

Meeting Link: https://www.microsoft.com/en-ca/microsoft-teams/join-a-meeting

Meeting ID: 289 721 421 471 1

Passcode: U492GT2d

About the Company

Auric is a mineral exploration company based in Oakville, Ontario and holds options over a growing property position of highly prospective Uranium properties in Labrador's Central Mineral Belt, Quebec; and a gold property, Goodeye, in British Columbia, Canada.

Note: Readers are cautioned that the geology of nearby properties is not necessarily indicative of the geology of the Company's properties.

AURIC MINERALS CORP.

Chris Huggins, Director, and CEO

For more information, please call (604) 968-4844 or email chris@greenwood.capital

Forward-Looking Statements

Except for the statements of historical fact, this news release contains "forward-looking information" within the meaning of the applicable Canadian securities legislation that is based on expectations, estimates and projections as at the date of this news release. "Forward-looking information" in this news release includes information about the Company's intentions, plans and future actions described herein and the terms thereon.
